channel.title: Spawning NPC's when using a item on item

item.title: Spawning NPC's when using a item on item
item.dc:creator: @r_r_r r r r
item.description:
@r_r_r wrote:

client.java:75: cannot find symbol symbol : method newSummonedNPC(int,int,int,int,int,int,int,int,int,int,boolean, int) location: class NPCHandler server.npcHandler.newSummonedNPC(npcID, absX, absY-1, heightLevel, absX- 1, absY-1, absX+1, absY-1, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(npcID), false, play erId); ^ client.java:77: cannot find symbol symbol : variable actionTimer location: class client actionTimer = 20; ^ client.java:10991: SummonNewNPC(int) in client cannot be applied to (int,int) SummonNewNPC(41, 1); ^
thats the error.

Read full topic

item.title: Spawning NPC's when using a item on item
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Declare:

public void SummonNewNPC(int npcID) { server.npcHandler.newSummonedNPC(npcID, absX, absY-1, heightLevel, absX-1, absY-1, absX+1, absY-1, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(npcID), false, playerId); summonedNPCS++; actionTimer = 20; }

and change your code to this

if(itemUsed == 314 && otherItem == 6200) { deleteItem(314, getItemSlot(314), 1); deleteItem(6200, getItemSlot(6200), 1); SummonNewNPC(1160); sM("You Summon a Chicken!"); }

Read full topic
item.source: Spawning NPC's when using a item on item

item.title: Spawning NPC's when using a item on item
item.dc:creator: @r_r_r r r r
item.description:
@r_r_r wrote:

This is my code for a little part of my summoning mini-game.

if(((itemUsed == 314) && (otherItem == 6200))){ deleteItem(314, getItemSlot(314), 1); deleteItem(6200, getItemSlot(6200), 1); spawnNPC(41, 1); sM("You Summon a Chicken!"); }
Thinking it will work I go ahead and compile I get this error.

client.java10986: cannot find symbol symbol : method spawnNPC(int,int) location: class client spawnNPC(41, 1); ^
Now I think I need a method somewhere, but where would I add this method in client.java ?

Read full topic
